scripts.cy:open: npx cypress open --env allure=true --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/ui/test/**/**/** --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run: set DEBUG=allure-plugin* && npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/ui/test/**/**/* --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:cucumber:run: set DEBUG=allure-plugin* && npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/cucumber/**/*.feature,excludeSpecPattern=*.spec.ts --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.pretest: rimraf allure-results allure-report cypress/videos cypress/screenshots && mkdir allure-results
scripts.allure:history: npm run allure:report && mv allure-report/history allure-results/history && rimraf allure-report
